thread.section_title: About.com Eastern Europe Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Prague Weather

title: Prague Weather
text:
Updated Articles and Resources 
Prague weather is best from late spring to early autumn, and many people find fall to be the best time to travel there - the crowds have thinned but winter has yet to come. Summers can be hot, and the high temperatures are compounded by the number of tourists that visit the city during the months of June, July, and August. Though cold, December is a popular time to visit Prague due to the holiday festivities that take place throughout the month. 
Click on the heading of each month to get more information about what to pack and what events are taking place no matter what time of the year you're traveling! Average January temperature: -1ºC / 30ºF January average high: 1ºC / 33ºF January average low: -5ºC / 22ºF Average rainfall: 20 mm / 0.8 in
